name: Mini-Dead
description: 144 FPS boss battle action with a devilishly creative game mechanic.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows 7 Procesador: 3.4 GHz Memoria: 2 GB de RAM Gráficos: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card DirectX: Versión 9.0 Almacenamiento: 50 MB de espacio disponible Notas adicionales: 144hz monitor not necessary but is recommended if you want to see how cool it is.
